pr_title: Fix a bug where a non-base WebClient does not respect the scheme of URI.

timeline.message:
Fix a bug where a non-base WebClient does not respect the scheme of URI.

Motivation:

The following example sends a reqeust with `HTTP` protocol, not user defined scheme
```java
var client = WebClient.of();
// send to "http://example.com/path"
client.get("h1c://example.com/path")
client.get("h1://example.com/path")
client.get("h2://example.com/path")
client.get("h2c://example.com/path")
```

Modifications:

- Use the scheme of the specfied URI if the client is non-based URI.

Result:

A non-base WebClient respects user defined schedme correctly.
